page.title: 04HOME LIFE
page.content: ON SATURDAY MORNING I WOKE UP AT A QUARTER TO SIX.I GOT OUT OF BED AND WASHED MYSELF.NEXT I HAD MY BREAKFAST. AFTER THAT I WASHED THE DISHES.THEN I COMBED MY HAIR AND GOT MYSELF READY FOR THE MOSQUE.I WAS VERY EXCITED BECAUSE IT WAS THE DAY OF MY TEST.I WAS VERY WORRIED BECAUSE I HAD NOT LEARNED ANYTHING FOR IT.WHEN I REACHED THE MOSQUE IT WAS 10.02 HOURS.THERE WERE FOUR GIRLS AND MYSELF IN THE ROOM.WHEN THE TEACHER ENTERED I BECAME VERY EXCITED.AT 12.25 I FINISHED MY TEST AND HANDED IT IN.I THEN WENT HOME. AFTER LUNCH I READ MY LIBRARY BOOK AND PLAYED AT BALLS. AROUND 8 O'CLOCK WE HAD SUPPER (CHAPATIES,SPINACH AND LETTUCE WITH TOMATOES).I PLAYED WITH MY COMPUTER UNTIL 10 O'CLOCK.I THEN READ MY BOOK FOR A WHILE BEFORE GOING TO BED AT 00.30 HOURS.
